parameters.name: Celt
parameters.description: Number of sketch points for the sketch points enumeration

parameters.name: Rgelt
parameters.description: Pointer to an array of sketch points of size Celt

parameters.name: PceltFetched
parameters.description: Pointer to the number of sketch points returned from the list; this value can be less than celt if you ask for more sketch points than exist, or it can be NULL if no more sketch points exist

title: IEnumSketchPoints.Next
description: Gets the next sketch point in the sketch points enumeration.
signature:
void Next( 
   System.Int32
Celt
,
   out SketchPoint
Rgelt
,
   out System.Int32
PceltFetched
)

parameters.name: Celt
parameters.description: Number of sketch points for the sketch points enumeration

parameters.name: Rgelt
parameters.description: Pointer to an array of sketch points of size Celt

parameters.name: PceltFetched
parameters.description: Pointer to the number of sketch points returned from the list; this value can be less than celt if you ask for more sketch points than exist, or it can be NULL if no more sketch points exist

remarks: For use in in-process DLLs only.
